1_19z3VucxwAoyQZwhmjEgA6vJ9TTp2GmGLN.body: Wow! So far, this looks like it might be the best one besides [Kaffiene](http://127.0.0.1:43110/search.kaffie.bit) and [Zerosearch](http://127.0.0.1:43110/zerosearch.bit). Hopefully they can learn from one another over the long run.
